titleStmt.title: An explanation of the commission of Jesus Christ; in relation to the gifts, call, mission, qualification, work and maintenance of his ministers under the gospel-dispensation. Compared with the gifts, call, mission, qualification, work, and maintenance, of the titular clergy of this commonwealth. Humbly submitted to the judgement of the committe, in relation to tythes; to the end they may see the contradiction betwixt them, and so deal with them accordingly. Published by John Spittlehouse.
titleStmt.author: Spittlehouse, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.C. and are to be sold by Rich. Moone, at the seven stars in Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
